job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtSeveral days a week will be in our Redwood City office Please be within commuting distanceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWho We AreltstronggtltpgtltpgtTruckLabs is a technology company on a mission to transform the trucking industry through connected hardware and innovative software products We apply advanced engineering and data science techniques to partner with the most advanced fleets in the country to improve their realworld fuel economy  driving bottom line savings and reducing greenhouse gas emissionsampnbspOur first product TruckWings is the industrys first active aerodynamics product for Class 8 trucks that automatically closes the tractortrailer gap at highway speeds Deployed across major national fleets TruckWings have completed over 250 million miles of highway drivingampnbspTruckWings are controlled by a proprietary cloudconnected telematics device which both operates and measures the performance of TruckWings and the trucksampnbspWith these technologies we are making a dent in the 300M metric tons of greenhouse gas emissions produced annually by tractortrailers while also increasing the profitability of our customers Learn more at wwwtrucklabscomltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtCandidates need to have 35 years of experience with proven results in structuring processing and visualizing raw data to create business impacting insights and supporting productsampnbspThis position will be based out of our office in Redwood City CalifornialtpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAbout YoultpgtltpgtWe are looking for a very curious data scientist who enjoys a deep dive into the raw data to ask the right set of questions and find the answers to those questionsampnbspYou will build tools and infrastructure that provide data cleansing ampamp transformation create statistical predictive and optimization models leading to actionable insights for new data products as well as performance metrics to drive business and product improvements You will analyze onroad data with a finetoothed comb and develop product requirements from first principles Your analysis will be critical in setting direction for the product and engineering teamsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat Youll DoltpgtltulgtltligtYou will own the analytical frameworks that drive decision making and direction for the product roadmapltligtltligtEnrich insights by supplementing telematics data with relevant data sourcesltligtltligtBuild models from the ground up  from data exploration to feature engineering model development  optimization and deployment into productionltligtltligtDesign rigorous experiments and interpret results to draw actionable conclusionsltligtltligtWork crossfunctionally with team leaders in Engineering Product Operations Marketing etc to explain your analysis and make recommendationsltligtltligtFacilitate objective decision making across the company by democratizing data through dashboards and other analytical toolsltligtltligtOperationalize data gathering and machinelearning infrastructureltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequired Skills and ExperienceltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree in Statistics Computer Science Mathematics or other quantitative field advanced degree a plusltligtltligt3 years of experience working as a data scientistltligtltligtKnowledge of machine learning techniques especially deep understanding for their benefits and drawbacks in realworld applicationsltligtltligtExcellent statistical intuition derived from practical handson experienceltligtltligtProficiency in Python SQL PySpark and ETL patterns and toolsltligtltligtExperience with scientific computing and analysis packages such as NumPy SciPy Pandas dplyr or ggplot2ltligtltligtExperience with machine learning libraries and packages such as Scikitlearn PyTorch Caffe2 TensorFlow Keras or TheanoltligtltligtExperience working on Cloud computing technology AWSGoogle CloudMicrosoft AzureltligtltligtExperience in the design analysis and interpretation of AB tests in a large data environmentampnbspltligtltligtExperience building predictive systemsltligtltligtAbility to work in a fastpaced and continuously changing environmentltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtPreferred SkillsltpgtltulgtltligtExperience with GIS data including Google Maps PlatformltligtltligtUnderstanding of Big Data Technologies like Apache Hadoop Apache Spark and MapReduceltligtltligtKnowledge in the Transportation or Logistics domainltligtltulgt
